mapper.select: select bas_push_message.id, agent_id as agentId, send_status as sendStatus, source_type as sourceType, source_id as sourceId, create_time as createTime, handle_time as handleTime, resend_num as resendNum, bas_push_message_content.target as target, bas_push_message_content.content as content from bas_push_message left join bas_push_message_content on bas_push_message.id = bas_push_message_content.id where bas_push_message.id = #{id}
